overview: Ali Baba lives in poverty while his brother Qasim lives a wealthy life. One day Ali Baba discovers a secret cave  which contains countless treasures. He tries to solve his financial problems with thehe contents of the cave, but as Qasim enters the picture, things turn irreversibly.
tagline: Ali Baba wel Arba'in Haramy, Ali Baba lives in poverty while his brother Qasim lives a wealthy life.
title: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
